problem_text_cn: 如图,在四边形ABCD中,AB∥CD,∠C=90°,AB=8,AD=CD=5,点M、N分别为BC、AB上的动点,E、F分别为DM、MN的中点,则EF长度的最小值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, AB ∥ CD, ∠C = N_0, AB = N_1, AD = CD = N_2, points M and N are the moving points on BC and AB respectively, and E and F are the midpoints on DM and MN respectively, the minimum value of the length of EF is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:作DH⊥AB于H,连接DN,则四边形DHBC为矩形,∴BH=CD=5,∴AH=3,∵E、F分别为DM、MN的中点,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}DN,在Rt△ADH中,DH=√{AD²-AH²}=4,当点N与点H重合,点M与点B重合时,DN最小,此时EF最小,∴EF长度的最小值=\frac{1}{2}DN=2,
